item.title: 'Decentralized Uber' Arcade City: 'We Will Submit a DAO Proposal'
item.description:
'Decentralized Uber' Arcade City: 'We Will Submit a DAO Proposal'

Until this week, our biggest successes were in Midland, TX, and Fresno, CA. In both cities we had a core group of highly motivated drivers who took the initiative to build large networks of riders and drivers themselves. They printed up business cards, went into bars, promoted themselves, organized drivers on Facebook, and stirred up business.

item.title: Bitcoin-Style Tech Will Enable Switzerland to Create "Neutral Virtual Space"
item.description:
Bitcoin-Style Tech Will Enable Switzerland to Create "Neutral Virtual Space"

Few countries can claim as distinctive a legacy as Switzerland's long adherence to a doctrine of absolute neutrality. Since the fall of Napoleon, the Swiss have managed to stay out of the international conflicts, including World Wars I and II and, to a certain extent, the Cold War, by agreeing to treat all sides equally.

item.title: The Ultimate List on Spending Your Bitcoin in Kiev, Ukraine
item.description:
The Ultimate List on Spending Your Bitcoin in Kiev, Ukraine

With all due respect to everywhere else on the planet, Kiev is the eighth most populous city in Europe and home to many high-tech industries, higher education institutions and world-famous historical landmarks. This week marks FinTech Week Ukraine and our first sponsorship in a Ukraine-based event!

item.title: Rights and Obligations In and Out of Blockchains
item.description:
Rights and Obligations In and Out of Blockchains

I believe it is vital to understand and think about basic concepts like rights and obligations in order to successfully understand Bitcoin, Ethereum and eventually replace the traditional financial instruments and systems that are all based on these models.

item.title: Modern day Robin Hood bank robber donated 25 Bitcoins to help fight ISIS
item.description:
Modern day Robin Hood bank robber donated 25 Bitcoins to help fight ISIS

A self-described "ethical hacker," who goes by the handle Phineas Phisher, is responsible for some of the highest-profile hacks on questionable organizations in internet history. Two of his previous targets were shady malware makers, assisting governments to spy on their own people.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH About To Burst? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH About To Burst? - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price gained further and is about to reach $15.00. We need to wait and see reaction of ETH/USD if it tests the mentioned level. Ethereum price gained further and is about to reach $15.00. We need to wait and see reaction of ETH/USD if it tests the mentioned level.

item.title: Coinbase Becomes GDAX And Adds Ethereum and Litecoin Trading
item.description:
Coinbase Becomes GDAX And Adds Ethereum and Litecoin Trading

Coinbase/GDAX joins a very long list of Bitcoin exchanges who have added Ethereum in the past. Exciting times are ahead for Coinbase customers and Ethereum enthusiasts, as the exchange platform will support ETH trading soon. Additionally, the company will rebrand to GDAX, and the new website and logo will be coming soon.

item.title: Tech Bureau and NEM Develop Catapult Blockchain Engine
item.description:
Tech Bureau and NEM Develop Catapult Blockchain Engine

Tech Bureau Corp is one of the most prominent blockchain players in Japan, and their partnership with NEW will lead to the development of a new blockchain engine called Catapult. This new engine is an augmented and amended version of Mijin, which was also developed in partnership with NEM.

item.title: Have you tested blockchain technology on any businesses you have equity in?
item.description:
Have you tested blockchain technology on any businesses you have equity in?

Answer (1 of 2): Yes. I'm trying to use blockchain to keep track of my loans and trade financing deals, and it is a *PAIN*. I'm one of the developers of Hyperledger fabric, and getting the &^%&^% code to $#%$#%#$% do $%$&$^&% productive is a $#%$#% pain in the $%%^%$^.

item.title: Is bitcoin the most powerful currency?
item.description:
Is bitcoin the most powerful currency?

Answer (1 of 3): Thanks A2A The most powerful? Oh, really? it sounds like tricky and Utopian I guess. It's a lot like in 1900 you asked whether USD would be as powerful as Gold, making it become the most powerful currency in the world that dominates all the financial system.
